title: Vegetarian Lifestyle - Zaozi Shu - Yuanshen Statium
description: 枣子树, at 浦东新区张杨路1458号源深体育中心北区3楼. Name in Chinese means jujube tree (Zaozi Shu), and it's one of four outlets with same name. Modern vegetarian restaurant with focus on fresh and healthful Chinese cuisine. Food is mostly vegan. Menu is in Chinese but with photos.
streetAddress: Level 3 (northern part), Yuanshen Statium, 1258 Zhangyang Road, Pudong District
